name: Looping Bravery
description:
Looping Bravery is a sci-fi deckbuilding roguelike card battler. Save the world from an alien invasion by traveling back in time to stop an event knows as "The Marking".

Fight versus various groups in the past and find out about the long lasting rivalry between RED vs BLUE organisation and their fight for supremacy.



At the start pick two weapons, one offensive and one defensive to help you on your journey.



Use your hard earned antimatter with your TMD (time manipulation device) to manipulate the turns to your advantage in combat.



Use over 240 unique weapon cards to defeat your enemies.



Choose from more than 30 items that bend the rules to of the game.



Uncover the story by engaging in conversations with enemies and gain various rewards at the end of every dialogue, but be careful, some revelations may be too much to handle.

Fight in the past and save our future.
